article_title: Church asks Boy Scouts to leave after organization allows gay leaders

article_metadata.description: MURFREESBORO — North Boulevard Church of Christ asked Boy Scouts to meet elsewhere after the national youth organization decided to accept gay adult leaders, a Boy Scout official confirmed.
